title: First Day Jitters
description: Your first remote meeting. Thankfully, people are forgiving.

dialogues.speaker: boomer
dialogues.text: Good morning. Let's get started. We've got a packed agenda and limited time, so let's stay efficient.

dialogues.speaker: zoomer
dialogues.text: Hey everyone! I've put together the Q4 highlights and a few slides on early Q1 trends. Shouldn't take long.

dialogues.speaker: boomer
dialogues.text: Thanks. Just a reminder to keep side conversations in the chat — and let's avoid talking over each other this time.

dialogues.speaker: karen
dialogues.text: Moving forward, we'll be tightening timelines around reporting. Too many delays last cycle.

dialogues.speaker: boomer
dialogues.text: Wojak, you had visibility on some of that — do you think the delays came from lack of clarity, or lack of ownership?

answers.text: Mostly ownership. The handoffs weren't clearly assigned.
I think it was due to unclear goals.
Honestly, it wasn't really my area.

feedback.text: That lines up with what we saw. Let's address that in the post-mortem.
That's not how it looked from our end. Be more involved next time.

dialogues.speaker: karen
dialogues.text: On that note — we'll be rolling out a revised ownership matrix. No task without a name attached.

dialogues.speaker: zoomer
dialogues.text: Also, I added a chart to the slides showing where we dipped below target in December. Should we pull that up now or circle back later?

dialogues.speaker: boomer
dialogues.text: Let's do it now. No point deferring numbers we all saw coming.

dialogues.speaker: boomer
dialogues.text: While we're here — Wojak, remind me, what was the main issue with Ops that week?

answers.text: System outage caused a backlog across multiple teams.
We were onboarding a new vendor.

feedback.text: Right. Let's make sure that's documented properly this time.
No — that wasn't it. Please review your notes before the next sync.

dialogues.speaker: karen
dialogues.text: Looking ahead: we need clearer escalation paths. If a ticket sits unresolved for more than 24 hours, it's too late.

dialogues.speaker: boomer
dialogues.text: We'll also be adjusting check-ins. More async, less noise. Unless anyone sees a problem with that?

dialogues.speaker: zoomer
dialogues.text: Nope, that actually works better for my timezone. I'll tweak the Slack workflows accordingly.

dialogues.speaker: boomer
dialogues.text: Alright. Let's wrap. Status updates by EOD. If you're blocked, say so before it becomes a Friday surprise.
